title: BWEL Breast Cancer Study
description: Refactor and migration to Rails version 6, refactoring legacy Javascript / jQuery to work with Rails 6 webpack. Refactor Twilio code for phone calls and text messages. Refactor Highcharts visualizations. Deploy to Ubuntu server. NOTE: trial ended 2022, site is no longer deployed.

title: MetroCommon 2050
description: Front end design, development and backend implementation work, including design and implementation of a tagging feature to filter, organize and display content based on type and topic_areas, built with RefineryCMS, Ruby on Rails, jQuery and vanilla Javascript

title: MetroFuture in Action
description: Triage and refactoring of a legacy app built with Backbone.js, refactored with a Rails API for backend data.

title: Equity Agenda
description: Maintainence and refactoring of a legacy app that had been using CARTO data, refactored to use custom data sets.

title: Massbuilds
description: Maintainence and refactoring of a legacy app built on Ember.js with Rails backend, which curates building plans past, present and future for Massachussets.

title: Climate Vulnerability
description: The impacts of climate change are not distributed equally.

title: Data Common
description: Metropolitan Area Planning Council Data Common
